entry.title: Vintage Porsche, Modern Safety
entry.summary:
...the slippery slope...

I wrote an article titled Vintage Porsche, Modern Safety for the July 2020 issue of The NOR'EASTER, a magazine written, edited, and published by the Northeast Region of the Porsche Club of America. You can read this article in the digital edition of the July 2020 issue …
entry.content:
...the slippery slope...

I wrote an article titled Vintage Porsche, Modern Safety for the July 2020 issue of The NOR'EASTER, a magazine written, edited, and published by the Northeast Region of the Porsche Club of America. You can read this article in the digital edition of the July 2020 issue here or download the July 2020 issue as a PDF.

entry.content:

I wrote an article titled Attending Your First HPDE (And so it begins...) for the June 2020 issue of The NOR'EASTER, a magazine written, edited, and published by the Northeast Region of the Porsche Club of America.
